website_summaries.verdict: This load binder has lots of fans and few complaints.
pros: DOT has approved of this for commercial transportation
Very sturdy and easy to use
cons: It costs more than some other single ratchet load binders

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: My husband order 6 of these's & less than a month and a half the Ratchet Part of 4 has broken . No good. I hope this review can help someone else. Please look elsewhere. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sanayda

customer_reviews.title: Good budget minded binder
customer_reviews.text: First of all, be sure to lube this before you use it because that will probably be the last time you think about it until it rusts... The binder works well. The ratchet mechanism is smooth but switching directions is a little clumsy. I would not hesitate to use these for consumer applications. For professional use I would probably spend more money on name brand product. These are DOT approved so no concerns if you are stopped for inspection.
customer_reviews.author: 80s dude

customer_reviews.title: These were affordable
customer_reviews.text: Compared price-wise to some others and bought several of these- one is very difficult to use and switch from tighten to loosen. They seem heavy duty but there is a great variation in the gear shape between the 5 I purchased. I will likely be returning at least one of these if it doesn't free up with some use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Design

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN A FEW TIMES OF USING IT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to sell at my store, and when the customer returned it after having it for 4 months and only using it a couple times, the ratchet mechanism broke. Amazon will not help me with the item, as the return window is past, and the company that it came from (Discount Ramps) will not help as it was purchased through Amazon. Beware, it is not worth the money. Now I am out the money as I had to make it right with my customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Barth

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: These work great, normally I wouldn’t buy something made in China but I was in a hurry and needed these quickly. I used them to haul a 10,000 lb load across the country, and all over the Rockies. No issues at all, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of Chinese steel but it seems to be as good as my 20 year old Chinese one and it still is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for chain binders and found this one. I bought two of them. It appears to be made of good quality and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: SpyDad

customer_reviews.title: Held subcompact tractor
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, held subcompact tractor on trailer with ease. Much safer than lever binders.
customer_reviews.author: Herman T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Work as they should at a cheaper price than the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Archer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived today checked it over. Very heavy duty ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today checked it over. Very heavy duty built it's for my dad's birthday gift. This is exactly what he's been looking for. I know he'll get many years of use
customer_reviews.author: Dwain Sissons

customer_reviews.title: just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: what you see is what you get. it was just as its pictured, works smooth and consistently. it was great for the price and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: He seems very happy with
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my son for Christmas. He seems very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: greg border

customer_reviews.title: Works As Expected
customer_reviews.text: This 9,200 lb Ratcheting Load Binder works great. It works well and is required on my heavy equipment that I haul on my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruso Minnifield

customer_reviews.title: Taking the frustration out of transporting my heavy equipment
customer_reviews.text: Love these, so much easier to use than chain binders, probably safer too. Heavy duty, well made, excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: zannsu

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life much easier
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought these a long time ago! They make it so much easier to secure a load, no cheater bar required.
customer_reviews.author: Ol'Bubba

customer_reviews.title: I have had no problem with these binders. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem with these binders. I have used them on equipment of 18,000lbs with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brito

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, half the price than what tractor supply sells them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: husband very pleased
customer_reviews.text: gave this to hubby for Valentine's along with his other presents - he had this on his wish list - I didn't see that he actually wanted TWO of them and now there' no more =( I hope you'll get some more soon so I can order him another one. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stockmann

customer_reviews.title: Binder in waiting
customer_reviews.text: Product confusingly took a while to get to me, but does'nt look like a bad product, hav'nt used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: trapperjohns

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. I used them to secure my Case skid steer while transporting it to a friend's house so he could re-gravel his driveway. Next trip will be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gnarly Charlie

product_meta.title: Discount Ramps Heavy Duty 9,200 lb Steel Load Binder for 3/8" and 1/2" Chain DOT Approved
product_meta.description: Durable, strong, and easy to use. The heavy duty ratcheting load binder provides added leverage for manually binding large loads on commercial transport truck trailers or rail cars. With a 33, 000 lb break strength, the load binder is made for securing loads up to 9, 200 lbs maximum. Tough, integrated hook ends extend up to 8" and work with either 3/8" or 1/2" chain loops. For custom cargo binding, the length is adjustable from 23" to 30" overall.
feature_bullets: Manually operated ratchet-style load binder with a 23-30" adjustable length
Large 9,200 lb load capacity with a 33,000 lb break strength
Hooks extend 8" and fit both 3/8" or 1/2" chain loops
DOT Approved for commercial transport truck trailer load securing
Heavy duty forged steel construction with a thick red paint finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
